title: kamala padha
sahitya:
kamalap pada malariNai maRavaadE

pazhani vaazh murugan

(kamala)



anupallavi



mumalap paDukuzhi vizhundiRavaadE

piRavaamai tarum oru

moortti karuNai seyymoortti ena amarar

keertanam sey kaarttigEyan tiruk

(kamala)



caraNam 1



arumaanava jananam eDuttum avamE 

maaL kazhindu viDin

varumaa siRidum suka anubavamE

tirumaal maruganE saravaNabavanE

dEvadEvanE enac

cindai seyya vandirangu kandan

sencaDaipparan kuzhandai seNg

(kamala)



caraNam 2



varuvaarv evar pruvazhikkudavi seya

aRivizhandanaiyE

iruvaadanai toDarumE allal seya

karuvaasalin varu tuyar maRandaayE

tuRandaayE aRa neRik

karai kaDanda maadar pOla yaanpuga

lurai kaDandu vari tuzhal manamE

(kamala)



caraNam 3



tisaiyE tinidizhi tozhil seyyaadE

avananRi aNuvum

asaiyaadenu marumozhi poyyaadE

asaiyaa danavaradamum aDai tozhuvaay

ayanum virumbum padam peRalaam

ateeta aananda bOgam adu 

vaamE inbam raamadaasan paNi

(kamala)
